message.body: Right this second I'm in new ulm bc my dad has been in the hospital. But I'm driving back tonight. Why?
Oh man, I'm sorry. We're hanging out next Friday all day in Minnie. Wanted to see if you wanted to get some Starbucks or a Long John Silvers basket
How about a gas station trip? Sounds lovely. I really hope not, but there's a chance I'll have to come back to new ulm for my dad.
Gas station nachos it is. What's going on?
He's been in here for over a week and they can't figure out what's wrong and he's getting weaker. It's sort of a nightmare.
I appreciate that. Oof. How are you?
